enroll-h4:
We process each enrollment by hand to ensure the best, most personal expierience.
You can expect an email from us within 24 hours to set up your lessons.

planSelection.timePerWeek: How much time can you commit to lessons per week?
planSelection.lengthDesc: Every lesson is 1.5 hours, which we believe is the ideal length for a one-on-one language class.

personalDetails.currentLevelLabel: What level are you at in Spanish today?

level1.name: Beginner
level1.desc: I know nothing or close to nothing.

level2.name: Intermediate
level2.desc: I have trouble listening or speaking, but know grammar and some vocab.

level3.name: Conversational
level3.desc: Can speak, and listen, but I need some more polish.

schedule.weeklyavailabilityDesc: Please select all times that work for you, so we can a good time for weekly classes.
schedule.availabilityDetails: Add any details about your availability, such as times and preferences. Please try to be as detailed as possible, so we can set up your lessons quickly.

error.availabilityRequired: Please select at least one day per class.
error.scheduleDetailsRequired: Please enter some availability details to help us plan your schedule.
